SEARCH
Package com.kraken.krakenhax

Class DeviceIdentityManager

java.lang.Object
com.kraken.krakenhax.DeviceIdentityManager
public class DeviceIdentityManager extends Object
Manages linking a physical device (via Firebase Installation ID) to a user account and restoring an existing session if present.

  • Method Details

    • getFIDAsync

      public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<String> getFIDAsync()
      Returns a Task that resolves to the Firebase Installation ID for this app instance.
      Returns:
      a Task that completes with the Firebase Installation ID (FID) string

    • fetchLinkedUserId

      public static void fetchLinkedUserId(DeviceIdentityManager.LinkedUserCallback callback)
      Fetch the userId linked to this device (if any) and provide it via callback.
      Parameters:
      callback - receives the userId or null if none/error.

    • updateAccountLink

      public static void updateAccountLink(String userId)
      Update (or create) the device -> user link. Sets lastSeen every call; sets createdAt only on first creation. Merge semantics to avoid overwriting other future fields.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID to link this device to.

    • clearAccountLinkAsync

      public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> clearAccountLinkAsync()
      Clear the association (e.g., on logout). Keeps the document so analytics like createdAt persist. Returns a Task that completes when the server update finishes.
      Returns:
      a Task that completes when the device's user link has been cleared in Firestore

    • clearAccountLink

      public static void clearAccountLink()
      Convenience fire-and-forget wrapper around clearAccountLinkAsync(). Use when the caller doesn't need to await completion.
